macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Markets End Week with Modest Losses Amid Volatility and Sector Rotation
items.summary: Major US indexes closed the week of January 24, 2026 with small declines: S&P 500 -0.4%, Dow Jones -0.5%, Nasdaq -0.1%, Russell 2000 -0.3%, and S&P MidCap 400 -0.6%. The week featured sharp rotations, with energy and materials outperforming while tech and industrials faced pressure.

items.title: Bank of America Warns of Major Stock Market Rotation Away from Tech Megacaps
items.summary: Bank of America predicts a significant rotation in market leadership, with emerging markets and international stocks favored over traditional tech-dominated positions. Energy (XLE) is up 10.02% YTD while Technology (XLK) lags at 0.78% YTD through January 23, 2026.

items.title: Russell 2000 Small-Cap Index Posts Historic Outperformance Streak
items.summary: The Russell 2000 outperformed the S&P 500 for 14 consecutive trading sessions through January 23, 2026—the longest streak since May 1996—with seven record closing highs already achieved in 2026. Small-cap stocks have rallied since early November as value and cyclical stocks regain favor.

items.title: Natural Gas Futures Surge 62.6% in Three Days on Record Move
items.summary: Front-month natural gas futures (NGG26) jumped to $5.05 per million BTU in a three-day surge representing the largest three-day percentage gain on record, catching heavily net-short speculators off guard.

items.title: Stock Market Flashing Inflation Warning Signal in Early 2026
items.summary: Market movements in the first few weeks of 2026 are signaling potential inflation concerns that could lead to a challenging year for investors.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: David Sacks Confirms CLARITY Act January 2026 Senate Markup
items.summary: David Sacks confirmed the CLARITY Act (Digital Asset Market Clarity Act) is headed for Senate committee markup in January 2026, potentially ending SEC-CFTC jurisdictional disputes and enabling banks to fully enter crypto. Bitcoin and Ethereum rallied 10-20%, with altcoins like SOL, ADA, and AVAX outperforming as regulatory fears lift.[1]

items.title: Senate Agriculture Committee Releases Digital Commodity Exchange Act Draft
items.summary: Galaxy Research's Alex Thorn announced a key Senate hearing on January 27 for the Digital Commodity Exchange Act draft, granting CFTC authority over spot crypto markets and set to merge with Banking Committee legislation for comprehensive market structure rules.[2]

items.title: $1.33B Outflows from Bitcoin ETFs Signal Institutional Retreat
items.summary: Bitcoin ETFs saw $1.33B in exits, Ethereum ETFs $611M outflows, and XRP's spot ETF its first negative weekly netflow of $40.6M, amid capital shifting to precious metals despite rising global liquidity.[5]

items.title: XRP Eyes $3.84 All-Time High in 2026 with CLARITY Act and ETF Catalysts
items.summary: Analysts outline four catalysts for XRP to reclaim its $3.84 ATH: CLARITY Act passage classifying it as a commodity, strong ETF inflows potentially locking 2.6B XRP, Ripple's RLUSD stablecoin growth, and sustained Bitcoin bullishness.[4]

items.title: Casterman Founder: 2026 Critical Turning Point for Crypto Infrastructure
items.summary: Casterman founder André Casterman states 2026 marks a shift to building regulated financial infrastructure like tokenization, CBDCs, and stablecoins, with banks investing heavily post-legislation clarity.[3]

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Over 20 Games Announced for Xbox Release Next Week (Jan 26-30)
items.summary: Upcoming Xbox releases include Highguard on January 26, a PvP raid shooter from Apex Legends creators; Our Adventurer Guild and Speedball on January 27; Drop Duchy on January 28; and Code Vein 2 on January 29. Xbox Game Pass adds five new titles, including Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2.

items.title: New Free Games Roundup for Weekend of January 24-25, 2026
items.summary: Comprehensive list of new free-to-keep games and free-to-play titles available this weekend across PC, Xbox, PlayStation, and mobile platforms.

items.title: Xbox Staff Share Weekend Gaming Plans After Busy Week
items.summary: Xbox writers discuss playing Resident Evil 4 DLC, Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown, Fable series, Rhythm Doctor, Star Wars Outlaws, and Death Stranding Director's Cut, inspired by recent Game Pass additions and Microsoft's Developer Direct.

items.title: Strategicon Announces Orccon 2026 Pre-Registration Starts January 24
items.summary: Pre-registration for Orccon 2026 gaming convention opens today at noon PST, following sold-out room blocks announced earlier.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: DiDi and GAC Aion Launch Next-Generation Robotaxi R2
items.summary: DiDi Autonomous Driving and Guangzhou Automobile Group's Aion officially delivered their new-generation robotaxi, the R2, equipped with advanced systems to process 360-degree environmental data in real time. The vehicles have secured road test licenses for Guangzhou.

items.title: Blockchain Security Research Advances Smart Device Protection
items.summary: Researchers have identified ways blockchain could significantly enhance smart device security, though data sharing limitations have previously hindered adoption of the technology.

items.title: Astronomers Reveal Detailed Radio Image of Milky Way
items.summary: A groundbreaking new radio image provides unprecedented detail of the Milky Way galaxy using low-frequency radio wavelengths to map its structure.

items.title: Keyera Completes $5.15 Billion Acquisition of Canadian NGL Business
items.summary: Keyera is set to become a national-scale natural gas liquids company in 2026 following its acquisition of Plains All American Pipeline LP's Canadian NGL business, positioning strategically important energy infrastructure under Canadian ownership.
